means: 雀斑，斑点( freckle的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Her face was freckled all over.
Her freckled skin glowed with health again.
sentence.Network_cn: 她长有雀斑的皮肤又泛出了健康的红光。

sentence.Network_en: He was tall, vigorous, sandy - haired, freckled, genial and voluble.
sentence.Network_cn: 他个子高高的, 精神抖擞, 淡茶色的头发, 脸上有雀斑, 性情和蔼,口齿伶俐.

entry.tran: 长有雀斑的;生有色斑的
entry.def: If a part of your body is freckled, it has freckles on it.

example.ex: ...a slight man with auburn hair and a freckled face.
example.tran: 一头红褐色头发、脸上长有雀斑的瘦小男子

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or covered with or resembling freckles
